meta.name: NIST AI RMF Risk Note (Example Grammar)
meta.description: A typed UCC grammar module for an AI RMF-aligned risk note.

authorities.name: NIST AI RMF Generative AI Profile

tasks.description: Produce an AI RMF-aligned risk note with explicit Map/Measure/Manage outputs under Govern constraints.

reasoning_steps: GOVERN: state scope, decision rights, and escalation triggers.
MAP: identify stakeholders, context, and harm vectors (technical, safety, systemic, equity, regulatory).
MEASURE: describe evaluation evidence, including uncertainty and subgroup performance where feasible/ethical.
MANAGE: propose mitigations, monitoring, incident response, and rollback criteria.

disclaimers: Research scaffold; not a legal compliance determination.
